Name: SecurityTrustAssuranceObservationValue
Title: SecurityTrustAssuranceObservationValue
Descriptino: Values for security metadata observation made about the digital quality or reliability of a trust assertion, activity, capability, information exchange, mechanism, process, or protocol.

Name: AuthZsubTypeVS
Title: Authorization subType events valueset
Descriptino: ValueSet of the Authorization AuditEvent types

Name: BasicAuditEntityTypesVS
Title: Entity Types used by IHE BasicAudit
Descriptino: For use with AuditEvent.entity.type.  This includes codes defined in the BasicAudit.

Name: DataSources
Title: participant source types for RESTful create
Descriptino: create agent participant types for user operators that are in REST

Name: OtherIdentifierTypesVS
Title: Other Id Types ValueSet
Descriptino: ValueSet of the Other Id Types allowed

Name: RestObjectRoles
Title: RESTful objects role in the event
Descriptino: The role that the given Object played in the Audit Event recorded

Name: UserAgentTypesVS
Title: Agent types holding User-Agent
Descriptino: AuditEvent.agent.type values holding OAuth/SAML identified user. Note that user is not just users, but representes the higest agent responsible for triggering the activity being recorded in the AuditEvent.  Often this agent also has a type coding that is more specific to the transaction and the direction of the transaction. - http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ParticipationType#IRCP // use for query/retrieve - http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleClass#AGNT // use for push/create/update - http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleClass#PAT  // use when the user is the patient - http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ParticipationType#AUT "Author" // used with create/update - http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ParticipationType#INF "Informant" // used with export - http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ParticipationType#CST "Custodian" // used with export
